description:
Tsuda`s parents are still out for work, but when he gets back, he finds Uomi in his house. Hata goes to interview the student council, and Shino and Aira graduate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: How to Talk About Love Properly / Long Range Attack / Hair Showing / Cherry Blossom Sky
Tadashii Koibana / Enkyori Attack / Ke no Line Nari / Sakura no Sora
正しい恋バナ / 遠距離アタック / 毛のラインナリ / 桜の空
